title: Nectar
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Pizza, Organic, Raw, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Mexican, Bakery, Catering
description: Serves farm-to-table plant-based meals including raw food as well cooked plus fresh cold pressed juices. Also offers grab and go meals and cooking classes. Since Oct 2015. Upstairs is its sister business Veda Studios which offers yoga, dance classes, massage, and acupuncture.
